data.name: VSOExtensionTrialExpiryInSevenDaysWithIncludedQuantityEmailTemplate
data.value:
%%##HEADING-TOKEN##%%
Tick tock...
Your 30-day free trial for %%##ExtensionName##%% ends in 7 days for %%##AccountName##%%.visualstudio.com. You can assign the extension to %%##IncludedQuantity##%% free users so they have access. Additional users without paid access to this extension will soon lose access. You can buy this extension from the Visual Studio Marketplace so these users can continue working seamlessly.
Buy
%%##FOOTER-TOKEN##%%

data.name: HockeyAppEmailTemplate
data.value:
%%##HEADING-TOKEN##%%
Thanks for your order!
This is what you purchased in the Visual Studio Marketplace:
Plan Monthly billing
%%##ExtensionName##%% %%##Price##%%
Microsoft Azure subscription used for billing: %%##SubscriptionName##%%
New HockeyApp users, please allow 1 hour as we get everything ready. We are creating your organization and will contact you with instructions on getting started.
Charges are pro-rated for this first month of use, and automatically renew on the first of each month until you cancel. Any questions? Visit our billing FAQ
Have additional questions or need support? Please visit us at HockeyApp support
Thanks for using HockeyApp!
The HockeyApp Team
%%##FOOTER-TOKEN##%%

data.name: XamarinUniversityEmailTemplate
data.value:
%%##HEADING-TOKEN##%%
Thanks for your order!
This is what you purchased in the Visual Studio Marketplace:
Plan Users Monthly billing
%%##ExtensionName##%% %%##Quantity##%% %%##Price##%%
Microsoft Azure subscription used for billing: %%##SubscriptionName##%%
New Xamarin University users, you will receive a separate email with your redemption code and instructions on how to get started.
Charges are pro-rated for this first month of use, and automatically renew on the first of each month until you cancel. Any questions? Visit our billing FAQ
Questions about your bill? Contact Azure billing support. Help or questions using Xamarin University? Please email training@xamarin.com.
Thanks for using Xamarin University!
The Xamarin Team
%%##FOOTER-TOKEN##%%

data.name: VSOBundlePurchaseRenewalEmailTemplate
data.value:
%%##HEADING-TOKEN##%%
Your Visual Studio subscriptions are renewing soon!
Wow, time flies! Almost a year has passed since you purchased your Visual Studio cloud subscription. We hope you are enjoying it.
Your Visual Studio cloud subscription(s) will automatically renew on %%##RenewalDate##%% using your Azure billing subscription. No other steps needed, just keep using the tools, services and resources you need to create, deploy and manage great apps.
For your reference, this is the Azure billing subcription associated to your Visual Studio cloud subcription : %%##SubscriptionName##%%
Subscription Users Annual billing
%%##ExtensionName##%% %%##Quantity##%% %%##Price##%%
Don't need your subscription(s) anymore? Just change the quantity before %%##RenewalDate##%%
If you have any questions about this transaction, please contact Visual Studio subscriptions support.
Thanks for using Visual Studio!
The Visual Studio Team
%%##FOOTER-TOKEN##%%
